description.value:
Frequency once per day

For a short time, you fully manifest the expectations of the god destroyer within you. All creatures within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] take @Damage[8d6[force]] damage with a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|basic:true] save. A creature that fails this save is also knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone]. For 1 minute, any creature who ends its turn within the 10-foot emanation takes @Damage[5d6[force]] damage with a basic Fortitude save. If you aren't drained, you can choose to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained]{Drained 2} when you use Dominion Aura to increase the radius of the emanation from 10 feet to 20 feet.
